sentences.english: In 840, large numbers of Uighurs (an ancient name for modern Uygurs) entered Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 公元840年，大批迴鶻人進入新疆。

sentences.english: In Xinjiang, the courtyard of almost every home has a grape trellis.
sentences.chinese: 在新疆，幾乎每家的院子裏都有葡萄架。

sentences.english: Yili area is one of the most abundant protected area in Xinjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 伊犁地區是新疆自然保護區數量最多的地區。

sentences.english: TO treasure up Xinjiang with mulberry bark paper.
Liu Yaohua was relieved from the post as Chief of the Bureau of Public Security of Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.
sentences.chinese: 免去柳耀華新疆維吾爾自治區公安廳廳長職務。

sentences.english: Football has a good public basis and tradition in the prefectures of kashgar and kerkyz, Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 足球運動在新疆中小學校具有良好的羣衆基礎和傳統。

sentences.english: Without an open society there can be no new-type economy.
sentences.chinese: 新疆經濟和社會發展的前景是美好的。

sentences.english: Kanas Lake is located in Northern Xinjiang, China, forceful Johnson show, picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 喀納斯湖位於中國新疆北部，雄渾嬌秀，風景如畫。

sentences.english: What's the View of Every Party about the Second Forum of Textile and Clothing Technology?
sentences.chinese: 第二屆新疆紡織服裝技術論壇舉辦，各方怎麼看？

sentences.english: About half of the road runs across Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: “絲綢之路”約有一半的路段位於新疆內。

sentences.english: It's vital goal for Xinjiang Produnction & Construction Corps to safeguard the security of northwestern borders.
sentences.chinese: 保障國家西北邊疆安全是新疆兵團的重要目標。

sentences.english: 13 men, including 3 natives of Xinjiang, were detained for participating in the fight.
sentences.chinese: 其中13人蔘與了集體鬥毆，包括3名新疆籍人員。

sentences.english: Xinjiang Karez back in the Han Dynasty two thousand years ago, there were problems of its shape.
sentences.chinese: 新疆的坎兒井早在兩千年前的漢代即出現其雛形。

sentences.english: The letter was signed by Xiang Wenying from the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps.
sentences.chinese: 這封的署名爲新疆建設兵團的向問英。

sentences.english: The establishment of the modern industrial system in Xinjiang is the result of government action.
sentences.chinese: 新疆現代工業體系的建立是政府行爲的結果。

sentences.english: The students in the experiments are English major from Xinjiang Universities of Finance and Economics.
sentences.chinese: 實驗教學中的學生來自新疆財經大學英語專業。

definition: Shanxi province (Shansi) in north China between Hebei and Shaanxi, abbr. 晋 capital Taiyuan 太原
Jilin province (Kirin) in northeast China, abbr. 吉, capital 長春|长春/also Jilin prefecture-level city, Jilin province
Sichuan province (Szechuan) in southwest China, abbr. 川 or 蜀, capital Chengdu 成都
Liaoning province in northeast China, short name 遼|辽[Liao2], capital Shenyang 瀋陽|沈阳[Shen3 yang2]
the Ili river basin around Turpan in Xinjiang/abbr. for 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Ili Kazakh autonomous prefecture
Ürümqi or Urumqi prefecture level city and capital of Xinjiang Uighur autonomous region 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区 in west China
Kashgar or Qeshqer (Kāshí) city and prefecture in the west of Xinjiang near Kyrgyzstan
Gansu province, abbr. 甘[Gan1], short name 隴|陇[Long3], capital Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1]
Guangdong province (Kwangtung) in south China, short name 粵|粤[Yue4], capital Guangzhou 廣州|广州
Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region, abbr. 寧|宁[Ning2], capital Yinchuan 銀川|银川[Yin2 chuan1]
Shaanxi (formerly Shensi), province in northwest China, abbr. 陝|陕[Shan3], capital Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4]
Qinghai province (Tsinghai) in west China, abbr. 青, capital Xining 西寧|西宁
Inner Mongolia/abbr. for 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], Inner Mongolia autonomous region
Tianjin, a municipality in northeast China, abbr. 津
Inner Mongolia or Inner Mongolia autonomous region 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
